Description: I am unable to reset my password. Each time I submit the reset form, I receive no email. I have checked my spam folder and verified my email address is correct. This has been ongoing for three days. Can you help me resolve this?
I was charged twice for my last payment. The duplicate charge appeared on my bank statement yesterday. Could you please investigate and issue a refund for the second charge?
I would like to know if your platform supports integrations with third-party tools like Zapier or Microsoft Teams. I run a small business and need seamless integration for my workflows.

The mobile app crashes every time I try to access the 'Account Settings' page. I am using the latest version of iOS. I have tried reinstalling the app, but the issue persists. Please help resolve this as soon as possible.
I need assistance updating my credit card details. The system gives me an error message every time I try to submit the new information. I'm worried this might disrupt my subscription payments.

I received an email about a failed payment, but my bank account shows the transaction was successful. Can you verify this and ensure my service remains uninterrupted?

The website's search feature is returning inaccurate results. For example, when I search for 'user guide,' it shows unrelated articles. Could you check and fix this issue? It has been ongoing for a week now.
